candidates.title: V0.2.1
candidates.body: This covers the deployment changes to support the version 0.2.1.

candidates.title: V0.2.1
candidates.body:
- add deploy to neutorn, archway config
- migration script
- other update scripts

Note: we will have different cli rewrite, these changes are just for now.

candidates.title: V0.2.1
candidates.body:
This adds cronkitty  and future plugins as submodule. 

The core contracts (factory, proxy, pluginreg) are in `contracts/core` and the plugins are in `contracts/plugins`. 

You can build and upload as normal. 

```sh
make build
make upload # this will upload plugins if they are set in `cli/config/chains`, see juno for example

# in cli
npm run deploy:hub 
npm run cronkitty:register # this will check if cronkitty should be on that chain with `cli/config/chains`
```

candidates.title: Feat: move Contoller state to vectis-wallet & fix tests
candidates.body:
- move controller state out of proxy to lib
- remove factory func
- fix tests on ts

candidates.title: Feat/plugin permissions
candidates.body: Allow for plugins to be different permissions

candidates.title: Feat/enhance deploy scripts
candidates.body:
- Splits deploy host and remote chains 
- Save deploys to public networks
- Fix plugin registry instantiate bug 
- Speed up local node tests
- Minor doc updates

candidates.title: Refactor: remove direct addrs in states
candidates.body:
Feats: 
- Proxy to install plugin via the registry 
- Plugin install fee

Enhancements:
- Make staking demon "TOKEN" to match multi test util
- Closes #126  (including common states and queries)
- Closes #106

NOTE:
This manually change the schema.json from sylvia. Issue documented [here](https://github.com/CosmWasm/ts-codegen/issues/98)

candidates.title: Integrate daodao v2, update test structure for export for plugin tests
candidates.body:
This works with release-  https://github.com/nymlab/dao-contracts/tree/v2.0.1-vectis-1.0

- `packages/vectis-test` was modified so that it can be exported to be tested with plugins
- using daodao v2 - main change is the pre-proposal approval (approved by committee, a cw3-flex multisig support by cw4-group

candidates.title: Tunnel msg deploy
candidates.body:
- mint govec handler with ack
- add job_id to all dispatch for tracking on frontend
- fixed messages via  tunnels only
-  `ibc_receive` must not fail

candidates.title: Remote factory
candidates.body:
- allow remote-factory and anyone to  to send funds to DAO / dao-chain account via remote-tunnel
- checks before openchannelconnect
- executeMsg for factory is the same for all chains

candidates.title: Feat/govec
candidates.body: This has unit tests in the govec contract only.

candidates.title: Factory support for multichain
candidates.body:
- added dao-chain and remote features
- remove storing of users->wallets mapping
- add unclaimed govec storage
- add claim message to route govec claim for proxy wallets
- updated multi-tests with new interface

candidates.title: Chore/restructure test
candidates.body:
- moved `contracts/factory/tests` to `contracts/tests`
- refactor `tests/common.rs` to instantiate with factory, govec and dao_tunnel
- add dir single-chain and multi-chain for different multi-test 
- rename previously multi-test file with prefix `dao-chain` to represent dao chain tests

candidates.title: Fix/issue 80 and merge ts codegen without bundle
candidates.body:
closes #80 and #84 

We have chosen to not use the bundle as it is easier to import only what is needed.

candidates.title: feat: download dao-dao contracts v1 for uploading
feat: ensure self cannot be guardian + update cosmwasm
Deploy Vectis DAO using daodao-v1 contracts
chore: rename packages and contracts
candidates.body:
- remove dep of govec in vectis-wallet
- sc-wallet -> vectis-wallet, wallet-factory -> vectis-factory, wallet-proxy -> vectis-proxy, govec -> vectis-govec

candidates.title: feat(wip): gov-token
candidates.body: Introduce governance token for the vectis community

candidates.title: Improvements and tests for multiple chains
candidates.body:
- ensure we filter only instantiation events in contract in `reply`
- make `addr_prefix` and `denom` etc depend on env file
- add script for running local juno node
- upgrade contracts to 0.13.0 of cosmwasm and use wasmd 0.24.0 and cosmwasm-std to 1.0.0-beta7

candidates.title: Multisig re-instantiation
candidates.body:
## Explanation notes
1. `migrate_multisig_contract` handle is added to the `factory` contract. (Note: you have to trigger it per each wallet address manually)
2. proxy `migrate` function is updated to handle both multisig and proxy migrations, depending on the type of migration message provided.
3. migration related security checks refactoring performed.
4. `RelayTxError` & `MigrationMsgError` error types refactored into `factory` package crate.
5. Multisig related migration integration tests added.
Closes https://github.com/nymlab/vectis/issues/5,
https://github.com/nymlab/vectis/issues/4
